name: Head & Shoulders Extra Strength Dandruff Shampoo, 13.5 fl oz

reviews.name: Head & Shoulders Extra Strength Dandruff Shampoo, 13.5 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is a God Send. I have used this product for 3 months now, and it has mad the flakes disappear and the itching subside. It smells wonderful and leaves your hair clean. I can use it every day and it doesn't dry out my hair. Wonderful product!
reviews.title: Shampoo for dandruff

reviews.name: Head & Shoulders Extra Strength Dandruff Shampoo, 13.5 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: the shampoo is giving results after 1 use is starting to relieve the itching really well.
reviews.title: i have used it once

reviews.name: Head & Shoulders Extra Strength Dandruff Shampoo, 13.5 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: After trying every dandruff shampoo (even prescribed shampoos by my doctor) I have finally found a solution for my severe dandruff. The secret is in the 2% zinc formula. Unfortunately my local store does not carry this item in stock, but I am happy to have the choice to order it. I've tried the 1%, which did not work. I've tried the 2% with a shampoo that was prescribed by my doctor, which only helped for a short time. I am so happy that after one year of use of this Head and Shoulders 2%zinc shampoo, my dandruff is still gone. I previously even tried all kinds of natural remedies, like tea tree oil, listerine etc. etc. for so many years and I hope my review helps someone to give this a try and hopefully find a solution like I did with this shampoo.
reviews.title: The ONLY shampoo that worked for me!

reviews.name: Head & Shoulders Extra Strength Dandruff Shampoo, 13.5 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is a God Send. I have used this product for 3 months now, and it has mad the flakes disappear and the itching subside. It smells wonderful and leaves your hair clean. I can use it every day and it doesn't dry out my hair. Wonderful product!
reviews.title: Shampoo for dandruff
